h1: Before you upload your digital fit note
p1: It is important that your fit note can be read by our system, or it could be rejected.
p2: If it contains a data matrix (a black and white square that looks like a QR code), it should be clear.
p3: Before you upload it, make sure:

list.li1: all the text can be read easily
list.li2: it is on 1 page with your contact details visible
list.li3: the whole fit note is visible, including all four corners

p4: The example image with the red cross could be rejected because the edges are missing. The example image with the green tick would be accepted because the whole fit note is visible.
